snippet.title: Hathras victim's kin and accused linked, Crucial call data records accessed | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Times Now has evidence that the cast a shadow over caste, atrocity narrative, that is being carefully built up around the Hathras incident. Call Detail Record (CDR) accessed which shows victim’s kin–accused were in touch. Over 100 calls between victim's kin & accused, they spoke on phone until the day before the crime.  

Political Analyst Sumanth Raman says that the CDR between the kin of the accused and the victim proves nothing. The stats show 90% of all rapes in India are committed by people known to the victim. Atrocities against Dalits are taken as a worrying phenomenon because the Dalit population tends to be the weakest section of the community. 

#HathrasProtestTruth

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com ( https://www.timesnownews.com/videos) for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Congress' Prithviraj Chavan proposal outrages Hindus? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Controversial Corona prescription. Congress proposal 'take trust gold to fund economy' outrages Hindus. BJP slams Congress bid to ‘Loot’ temples. ‘Congress eyes Temple Gold, silent on Waqf?’ 

If anyone believes that religion should keep out of States, then States should also keep out of religion. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

The temple in India under govt was a British idea. Temples have not got the freedom and that’s the reality. says, Activist Rahul Easwar.

NDA fights to bring back Nirav Modi. India prepares watertight case, but Congress neta provides ‘Shield’ & vows to block Narendra Modi Government. BJP slams Congress for ‘Bailout’. Does Congress put ‘Client’ over the country?

#CongEyesTempleGold #CongWithNiravModi

Watch!

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Congress honours Gandhis' birthdays, but defiles PM Modi's birthday? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront today, Rahul Shivshankar illustrates how Congress mocked Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s 70th birthday today. Congress has marked Former PM Jawaharlal Nehru’s birthday as ‘Bal Divas’, Indira Gandhi’s birthday as ‘Ekta Divas’, Rajiv Gandhi’s birthday as ‘Sadbhawna Divas’, but, it has mocked PM Modi’s birthday as ‘Berojgar Divas’.

JNU leaders also mocked PM Modi's birthday and observe 'Unemployment Day'. This slandering attack of Congress has erupted major disputes and brawl between the two parties. The BJP has decided to honour Prime Minister Modi by celebrating his birthday week as ‘Seva Saptah’ and conducting several social services for the poor and needy.

If Congress can honour Gandhis, then why not PM Modi?

Supreme Court lawyer, Ishkarn Bhandari says, ‘Gujarat CM became the prime minister of India because he had delivered which he said and he has credibility’, whereas RJP Spokesperson says, ‘Everybody knows the reality of Lalu Prasad Yadav and how did he become the symbol of poor in India’.

WATCH!

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com ( https://www.timesnownews.com/videos) for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.description:

snippet.title: How can India contain China? Should India & United States of America become allies? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, The tussle in Ladakh between India and China over the LAC clashes at Galwan Valley did not only stir the politically and economically but it is now a debate within different countries. Waging a war against China is not easy, but creating an alliance with the United States is still in talks. India has exposed the limitations pertaining to foreign policy. It acts as a consensus that emerges from the knowledge of experts.

After the collapse of the Berlin War and the beginning of the Cold War, India placed its faith in multilateralism. India realized the whole idea of 'friends with all, but allies with no one' policy might have left it vulnerable in the face of Chinese adventurism. 

India now has a cause to correct and look for options to contain China in the subcontinent. Should India as a country formally ally with the United States against China? #India #China #IndiaUpfront #IndiaVsChina

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Tirupati assets over auction, Hindus faith put under hammer? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, After Congress, YS Jagan Mohan Reddy cites COVID crisis. Congress tried to take temple gold, now Jagan eyes ‘Daan’ of ‘Devotees’. Hindus condemn ‘Sale of their faith’. ‘Waqf bodies scarcely ever audited, but Hindu faith put under the hammer?’

TTD is an independent board and takes its decisions independently. Andhra Govt has nothing to do with this decision on auction. says, Andhra Pradesh Government Advisor Devulapalli Amar.

Be it a temple or a church, every deity who has a property which is handled by a human manager. says, Senior Advocate Sanjay Hegde.

#TirumalaTempleTargeted

snippet.title: Tablighi's gets a free pass for 'Dhaka', Centre suspects state complicity? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, shocking details of West Bengal government’s complacent approach to bringing Tablighis to justice as it gives wanted foreigners a free pass to Dhaka. Responsible for wilfully spreading COVID-19 across the length and breadth of this country during the initial stages of the outbreak, these people had lied to visa authorities about what they intended to do India. 

Even with the Centre issuing lookout notices for Foreign Tablighis, the Mamta Banerjee government in a blatant disregard for the law has allowed the attendees to leave the country. Tablighis on the run were caught by the forces at the India-Bangladesh checkpoint. 

The Bengal Government has responded by vehemently denying all allegations. There is sheer politics behind this matter on a free pass to Markaz by Bengal says, Anirban Banerjee, TMC Supporter 

How long before the West Bengal Government stops prioritizing politics over public health? 

The Delhi Police charge sheet has named 20 Hindus in its investigation proving once and for all that it is the lobby which is selective not the State. The Police’s commitment to fair investigation exposes leftist propaganda created to malign India. The question remains will The Hindu-phobic lobby which was questioning the credibility of the police now apologize.

#MamtaMarkazFreePass #HinduphobicsApologise

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Pok on India weather map, Safest in PM Modi's hands? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, 73-yr long dithering ends! PoK is now on India’s weather map as India will cross ‘LoC-shaman’ Rekha. PM Narendra Modi's clear message to the world: India will ‘Reclaim’ all of Kashmir. ‘Who held India back for more than 70 years?’

PoK on India’s weather map is a symbolic move & I don’t think Pakistan’s response should be given too much attention. says, Strategic Affairs Expert Sushant Sareen.

On April 30, 2020, Govt of India objected to Pak’s provincial election in PoK. says, BJP's  MP & National Spokesperson GVL Narasimha Rao.

#ModiSetsEyesOnPok

Watch!

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: What's behind Delhi's COVID-19 death spike? | India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar tonight, Slow but gradual increase in Coronavirus cases in Delhi to the point now where Delhi is in the top three in the country with regards to COVID-19. But the figure that is causing a great amount of concern is the spiralling death rate in the Union Capital. 

Delhi today has a death rate at 29.72%. India's average death rate is 4.25% and the other states where 150+ cases have been detected between April 6th to June 2nd. In the data, you can see that over a period time there has been a huge jump in the number for Delhi in just a period of 10 days.

We ask: What's behind Delhi death spike?

snippet.title: Chinese pullback contested, Are the questions justified? | India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar
snippet.description:
On India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar, the India China-LAC (Line of Actual Control) because there are several analysts, former military men who have come out and said that the Chinese are further into the Indian territory. There are satellite cartographic images show how the Chinese have successfully moved in and occupied vast tracks of Indian tracks. of Indian soil in at least 3 of the successful 4 contested areas in the Union Territory of Ladakh.
On the panel today we have Maj Gen (Dr)GD Bakshi, National Security Analyst Nitin A. Gokhale, Colonel S Dinny (Retd), Lt Col Anil Duhoon (Veteran) who discuss the India-China standoff in detail and whether the two countries are actually de-escalating from the LAC in the eastern Ladakh region. Watch the video to know more!

snippet.title: Sushant Singh Rajput Case: State fails to probe foul play? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, A day after Times Now push for justice in Sushant Singh case. The Centre’s ‘poised’ to step-in, but Aaditya Thackeray slams ‘street politics’. 

TIMES NOW has spoken to Sushant Singh's former assistant Ankit Acharya, who lived with the actor before being sacked by Rhea. Ankit claims 'Rhea did jaadu-tona', while Siddharth Pithani watched.

Congress leader Akhilesh Prasad Singh demands CBI probe in the Sushant Singh Rajput death case. 

Aaditya Thackeray's letter is an attempt to play the victim card. says, Lawyer Shehzad.

There's an attempt to create a rift between 2 states. says, Shiv Sena's Tamil Nadu President G Radhakrishnan.

When there's an ADR registered, you don't need F.I.R & Mumbai Police did register the ADR. says, Senior Advocate Rizwan Merchant.

#SushantConspiracyTruth

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: India punishes China but opposition mocks, Martyrs deserve better | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, India banned 59 Chinese mobile apps. But Opposition hits out at govt over this ‘Digital’ strike.

It is for the 1st time that a decision has been taken and a decision that has sent out an unequivocal message. It is for the 1st time that a decision that has sent out an unequivocal message has been taken. This is a campaign that was spearheaded by the people of India. The govt has merely taken it to the next level and that should be welcomed. says, BJP National Spokesperson Amit Malviya. 

We need to teach this bully (China) a lesson. This was a defensive move. The fact of the matter is that the clock has been and is ‘Taking & Toking’ for China. says, Author Anand Ranganathan.

#ModiDigitalDhamaka

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: The Kamala Harris FACTOR; Can India expect special treatment? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Kamala Harris has become a first mixed-race woman in America to accept the nomination for a major US presidential ticket. Power & glory to Indian Americans as pollsters predict Harris is X-factor. 

Kamala Harris was a safe choice, the Indian vote is very important. Kamala Harris calls herself South Asian, why don't she introduce herself as an Indian-American. says, the Founder Republic Hindu Coalition Shalabh Shalli Kumar.

We should remember that Kamala Harris is not really playing for India, she's playing for the U.S. says, TOI Diplomatic Editor Indrani Bagchi.

Kamala Harris said that she is a black American woman who is proud of her Indian heritage. says, TOI Foreign Correspondent Chidanand Rajghatta. 

#KamalaHarrisFactor

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Why Delhi COVID hospitals deny beds even after listed on Government's app? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, TIMES NOW fact-checks 3 private hospitals listed on Delhi Govt app & reveals multiple mismatches with data. The app shows vacant beds, but hospitals deny availability. 

Reality check for Lutyens gang. Safoora Zargar’s ‘Dissent’ is dangerous, ‘Played with embers’ says the judge. But Left-liberals chide court. 'Sadak pe faisla' is acceptable, ‘Adalat ka faisla’ is an insult?’

We have to understand that court doesn’t represent the fabric of India since if we look at the diversity of judges, their caste as well as religions, we can notice the lack of diversity that exists. says, Author Suraj Yengde.

Times Evoke, a unique print & digital initiative by the Times Network presents India’s biggest concert for the environment, LIVE with Grammy winner Ricky Kej. The concert will be telecasted on June 13, at 8 PM.

#DelhiCovidInvestigation #LobbyMalignsCourts

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’

snippet.title: Flying in the time of COVID, Can fear be contained? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Air prices capped & 1/3rd capacity. Flyers to follow new procedures, with safer & sanitised airports. Check-in, security process tweaked. ‘Fares capped and fears contained?’

Adding insult to migrant misery, Congress ‘Misses’ the bus in Rajasthan and now, mismanages Mumbai ‘Relief’ as migrants misled, forced on roads. 'Lies' in Lucknow, 'Lathis' in Mumbai. ‘Cong's 'Nyay' a gimmick on 'Garib'?’

Under the Disaster Management Act, State permissions are not even required to run the train. says, Political Analyst Tehseen Poonawalla.

#FlightFaresCapped #CongMigrantShame

snippet.title: Congress will talk about 'Tyag', But won't give up top post? | The Newshour Debate
snippet.description:
On The Newshour Debate with Navika Kumar, Gandhi always talks about their sacrifice, the way two members of their family were assassinated, how Sonia Gandhi stepped aside to let Manmohan Singh become the Prime Minister in 2004.

Today, when hundreds of Congress workers are allegedly fed up with the internal crisis and are looking for a complete overall, as fas as the high command in the Congress Party is concerned the same Gandhis have put themselves above the Party and refused to give up power. 

Sonia Gandhi will continue as the Party president because there is no specified definition of an interim Congress president.   

#GandhiMuktCong

snippet.title: Rahul Gandhi takes a dig at PM Modi; Govt counters with ‘Fact checks’ | The Newshour Debate
snippet.description:
On the Newshour Debate today, Navika Kumar discusses Congress leader Rahul Gandhi, who seems to be on an overdrive to corner the BJP government over the farm legislation. Rahul Gandhi has been protesting since the last few days, perched on the top of a tractor, fighting for the cause of farmers. Rahul Gandhi however, was seen seated on a sofa seat as claimed by the BJP on the tractor, during one of these protests. An image was made viral by the BJP in which Rahul Gandhi can be seen seated on a sofa seat, which several of BJP ministers tweeted. Rahul Gandhi took a jibe at the Prime Minister when one of the NDA ministers questioned him about the tractor image. Rahul Gandhi questioned why nothing was said when two special aircraft were delivered for the Prime Minister. 

Rahul Gandhi’s reference to the aeroplanes is in regard to the Air India One, which has been procured for the VVIPs. To discuss the same, Navika Kumar is joined by Shehzad Poonawalla, Sanjay Jha, Abbas Hafeez, Gaurav Bhatia. 

Shehzad Poonawalla states that Rahul Gandhi is always confused about the facts, whether it’s Rafale plane or this plane. Gaurav Bhatia adds to this and states that a person who has been doing his picnics on INS Viraat definitely doesn’t have the right to raise these questions. Sanjay Jha, the former Congress member, refutes these arguments and states that if Rahul Gandhi decides to get into a tractor and really make that a symbolic manifestation of farmer protest being backed by the Congress party, it should be considered good in a democracy. 

Subscribe to Times Now | Click Here ► http://goo.gl/U9ibPb

Log on to www.timesnownews.com ( https://www.timesnownews.com/videos) for the latest news & updates. Give a missed call on 1800 4190 300. Stay updated, stay ahead.’
